tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
quoteDoc: Amazon Prime Video Terms of Use
quoteText: If you purchase a subscription or start a free trial for a subscription, your subscription will automatically continue, and you authorize us (without further notice, unless required by applicable law) to collect the then-applicable periodic subscription fee including any taxes, using any payment method we have on file for you.
